meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Thompson Vivek Srikrishnan Claudia Stucke Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7264.

td.p: Sarah Thompson, an art history professor from Rochester, New York
Vivek Srikrishnan, a graduate student from State College, Pennsylvania
Claudia Stucke, a former writer and high school English teacher from Decatur, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $30,600)

tr.td: THE FIRST MILLENNIUM
SPORTS SHORTS 2015
PHYSIOLOGY
BOOZIN' IT UP
TRIPLE RHYME TIME
FINAL RESTING PLACES
(Alex: How appropriate.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '393 years after a bigger eruption, it was active again in 472, sending ash clouds as far away as Constantinople')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: 393 years after a bigger eruption, it was active again in 472, sending ash clouds as far away as Constantinople

tr.td: Claudia
Vivek
Sarah
OPERA AT THE MET
THEY DIRECTED THEMSELVES
IT'S IN THE BOOK
NATIONAL ANTHEMS
LIMITED TIME ONLY
"CALL" NOW

')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: His health didn\'t improve all that much; he died, unfortunately, of tuberculosis.)
...
(Alex, to Claudia: That\'s kind of a funny answer, though.)
(Claudia: Thank you)
...
(Alex: Tubercular gambler, gunman, friend of Wyatt Earp, involved at the Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.)
ClaudiaWho was Colgate?
$4,001
SarahWho is Doc Holliday
$3,999
VivekWho is Walter Reed?
$10,801
Doc Holliday')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1872 he wrote his thesis "Diseases of the Teeth" & soon after moved west to a drier climate for his health')

tr.td: 19th CENTURY AMERICANS
In 1872 he wrote his thesis "Diseases of the Teeth" & soon after moved west to a drier climate for his health
Claudia
Vivek
Sarah
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $16,999
Claudia
Vivek
Sarah

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
